introduction: 九寨沟1992年成为世界自然遗产。本片从2005年至2008年共花三年在不同时间不同季节完成九寨沟七绝的景色，有秋色、彩叶、蓝湖、倒影、飞瀑、激流、栈道等如诗如画视听画面。Jiuzhaigou National Park is a nature reserve in the north of Sichuan, a province in south western China. It is known for its many multi-level waterfalls and colorful lakes, and was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1992. It belongs to the category V (Protected Landscape) in the IUCN system of protected area categorization.
